wimalasiri mahatha delthota wani palathaka pradeshiya lekam karyalayak magin mewani garugambhira sahithya uthsawayak pawathwimata katayuthu kirima thama agaya karana bawath sahithyayen thora jiwithayak nomathi bawa pasal daru dariyanta awabodha karawima itha wadagath bawath ada me uthsawayata sinhala demala saha muslim darudariyan thamange kala kusalathawayan kala elidakwimata ek wima wisheshayak lesa thama dakna bawath pawasiya.delthota pradeshiya lekam uthpala jayarathna mahatha delthota wani mahanuwara disthrikkaye hewahata mathiwarana kottashaye dushkara pradeshayaka mewani gambhira sahithya uthsawayak pawathwimata hakiwima pilibadawa thama sathutu wana bawath me sadaha bhedayakin thorawa sinhala demala muslim janathawage sahaya labunu bawath me palathen bihiwu silarathna senarath saha nawanaliye wijethunga wani chathika kalakaruwanta prathama wathawata siya upan gamedima upaharayata lakkirimata labima gana thama sathutu wana bawath sandahan kaleya.ee sandaha thamata sahaya dakwu thama karyaya mandalaye sahakara pradeshiya lekam tharanga jayasekara sanskruthika niladhari asoka mahathmiya athulu grama niladhari mahathun athulu samata thuthi pudana bawada pawasiya.me uthsawaya amatha prawina madhyawedi silarathna senarath, prawina lekhaka nawanaliye wijethunga, delthota sahakara lekam tharanga jayasekara, bhadrawathi maha widyalaye widuhalpathi jayasinha mahathmiya, delthota grama niladhari upul yana mahathma mahathwarun da uthsawa shalawa amatha katha kalaha.

yuropiya bara esawime surathawaliyedi kilogram 75ta wadi kantha tharaga isawwa niyojanaya kala rusiyanu kridika tatiyana kashirina kilogram 146 k esawimen nawa loka warthawak bihi kirimata samath wuwa ya.aya wisin binda helanu labuwe pasugiya wasare sapthambar masaye thurkiyedi kilogram 145 k esawimen pihitu wu ayagema loka warthawamaya.me tharaga isawwedima mulu bara kilogram 327 k esawimen thawath loka warthawak thabimata kashirina samath wuwa ya.chinaye jan mi ran wisin 2008 wasare bijin olimpik ulele di mulu bara kilo gram 326 k esawimen mita pera ema loka warthawa pihituwanu labuwa ya.mewara yuropiya bara esawime surathawaliye kilo gram 75 ta wadi kantha tharaga isawwe dewani sthanaya aarmeniyawe ripsim thurshudyan saha thewani sthanaya thurkiye ummuhan ukar wisin himikara ganu labuha..
